pages.text: $(l)$(item)Elemental shards$() - are pieces of very fragile crystal that can contain any element.$(br2)They are pretty $(l)common$() in nature just like iron.

pages.title: How to obtain
pages.text: There are several ways to find them!$(li)The first way is mining!$(br)They are generated at a height of <Y:40 and can be mined with a stone pickaxe.$(li)The second way is to find them in the world! Either in the dungeon or in the trade.
